required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Korean Medicine Patient Registry of Post-operative Therapy for Musculoskeletal Disorders
clinical_study.official_title: Korean Medicine Patient Registry of Post-operative Therapy for Musculoskeletal Disorders - Prospective Multicenter Observational Registry -

lead_sponsor.agency: Gachon University Gil Oriental Medical Hospital

collaborator.agency: Korean medicine hospital of Daejeon University
Wonkwang University Iksan Korean Medicine Hospital

clinical_study.source: Gachon University Gil Oriental Medical Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: To create an infrastructure that allows for the conduct of prospective, controlled studies comparing the effectiveness of diagnostic and treatment strategies for patients with musculoskeletal disorders after musculoskeletal operations

primary_outcome.description: Assessment of musculoskeletal pain intensity by Numeric Rating Scale (NRS)

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Disability and estimating quality of life
primary_outcome.description: Disability and estimating quality of life by Oswestry Disability Index

primary_outcome.measure: Change in reduction of pain severity by K-WOMAC
primary_outcome.description: Assessment of pain severity by K-WOMAC

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Pain and disability of the shoulder by SPADI questionnaire
primary_outcome.description: Assessment of Pain and disability of the shoulder by SPADI questionnaire
The health status will be observed with the Euroqol (EQ-5D-5L) questionnaire.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Severity assessment of any symptoms other than pain
primary_outcome.description: Severity assessment of any symptoms other than pain by Numeric Rating Scale (NRS)

arm_group.description: Enroll the post operative musculoskeletal disorders patients and follow up their clinic visits and treatment regimen to analyze their utility in healthcare

study_pop.textblock: patients who suffers from various symptoms after musculoskeletal surgeries

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- aged 19 and over
- Those who have undergone musculoskeletal related surgery (corresponding to the disease classification code M00-99, S00-99) within 3 years
- voluntary applicant who has no problem with communicate with study associates or a mild cognitive impairment patient who scored higher than 23 points in Korean version of the montreal rating questionnaire with voluntary participation
Exclusion Criteria:
- Participants in other clinical trials
- Those who are unlikely to be adhered to the schedule of clinical studies
- Those who are expected to have difficulty understanding and responding to research questionnaires such as illiteracy, mental and physical weakness

overall_official.affiliation: Gachon University Gil Oriental Medical Hospital

facility.name: Gachon universiry affiliated Gil oriental medicine hospital

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Gachon University Gil Oriental Medical Hospital
